about_the_game:
Embark on this thrilling journey through pixelated scenarios full of challenges, enemies, and intense action! Alien Strike offers a classic 2D gaming experience, combining elements of action, platforming, and local multiplayer for up to 3 players, all immersed in the vibrant atmosphere of cyberpunk.




Choose from 4 different characters. Master their shooting skills in 8 different directions, slide across the floor, climb cables on the ceiling, and ladders to explore every corner of the environment in a world that evokes the nostalgia of arcade classics.


With the ability to carry up to 2 different weapons, players can customize their approach to combat. Each weapon has an upgraded version that can be unlocked by repeatedly collecting the same type of weapon. Strategy is the key to victory in this futuristic and unforgiving world.


Avoid certain death with strategically placed shield items throughout the map. Additionally, unleash powerful special moves that are charged as you eliminate hordes of enemies, all to the sound of electrifying retrowave-style music, evoking the atmosphere of 80s classics.


Get ready to face even bigger challenges at the end of each stage, where giant bosses await to test your skills and strategies. Only the most skilled will survive in this cyberpunk underworld full of action and danger.


Alien Strike offers an engaging experience with local multiplayer. Explore exciting levels and team combat challenges or take on the alien hordes alone, in an epic journey that combines the best of arcade classics.

name: Alien Strike: Blasting the Intruders

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card

short_description: The earth has been invaded by aliens, and even though they are still in training, a group of soldiers are trying to save their city while trying to understand why it happened so quickly.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
